name: Piquemal, Jean

goal:
A - Perform studies for, or advise, or represent EU stakeholders in the regulatory aspects of:
- international and EU regulatory aspects related to trade
- radio spectrum matters (free circulation of equipment, spectrum regulatory management, at EU, European, or global levels)
- associated standards
- Electronic communications (infrastructure, services).

B - Advise Panamanian & Central America Institutions and NGOs regarding cooperation with EU and EU funding
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Trade
